Reviews.Title: Net Media NM-VS$X1 video sequencer not functioning as expected
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Depalma "ralphie"
Reviews.Content: does not function as expected.  Cryptic controls; not intuitive.  did not switch between 2 cameras when the proper dipswitches were set as shown in the instruction paper.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sequences 2 / 3 or 4 video inputs through 1 output
Selectable for 1 to 63 second dwell
Microprocessor controlled
Supports NTSC or PAL in color and B&W;
Rugged aluminum enclosure
ProductInfo.Name: Net Media NM-VS4X1 Video Sequencer - 4 Inputs to 1 Output
